@valfirst  in the current implementation, the filter will be cleared off on before scenario hook.
Is it expected behavior?
Shouldn't we support filters that will work whole run time? (For example, if we need to pass basic authentication for some of the requests)
And I think we should give the user the possibility to clear the filters via step.
that's a good point, but it's out of scope this PR
I believe unit test should be expanded a bit to invoke the filter actually (and 2 unit tests will be required: when URL matches and doesn't match to the rule)
